llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 19th): St. Petersburg to Appleton Flight

* Depart from Pulkovo Airport in St. Petersburg at 10:00 AM (Flight F3574992, $332)
* Arrive at Appleton Airport at 1:42 PM (flight time: 2 hours and 51 minutes)

Day 2 (March 20th): Appleton

* Check in at a hotel or Airbnb in Appleton ($80-100 per night)
* Explore the city, visiting local attractions such as the Fox Cities Performing Arts Center, the Appleton Museum of Art, and the Houdini Museum ($30-50 per person for each attraction)
* Enjoy dinner at a local restaurant ( $15-25 per person)

Day 3 (March 21st): Return Flight to St. Petersburg

* Depart from Appleton Airport at 10:00 AM (flight time: 2 hours and 42 minutes, flight F3578689, $332)
* Arrive back in Pulkovo Airport in St. Petersburg at 11:41 AM

Budget Breakdown:

* Flights: $664 (Flight F3574992 and Flight F3578689)
* Accommodation: $200 (assuming an $80-100 per night hotel or Airbnb)
* Food and Attractions: $340 (estimated cost for dinner and local attraction visits)
Total Budget: $1,200

Note: The budget breakdown is an estimate based on the information provided. Actual costs may vary depending on various factors such as time of year, availability of discounts, and personal preferences.
